I got the red blouse, and I feel like a princess wearing it 😅 It's so pretty and fits as expected! It's not all that warm though, but it's a shirt so that's expected in winter. This blouse is so comfy and very stylish. I Love the length and the beautiful fall color it came in. I hope there are more colors coming. I would buy again.

These fit very well and my daughter the fashionista approves.  I have six of these because they are so comfortable and look great. First of all this shirt is a knit--I wasn't sure when I purchased it and that was not my preference. Great everyday shirt. Material is light to medium weight.
True to size, with pretty cut.
Color, fabric, fit, shipping all as expected. Read the measurement guide. I go by my bust size and needed a smaller size than normal.

评论概述: Lovely top, very soft, good value, fits well.
评论详情: This is appropriate for casual or a bit dressier. I got the extra large and it's a flattering fit, not too tight, but not baggy . The fabric is soft, love the fitted wrist on the sleeves. Color is true to the picture.

This shirt is so cute and has a nice material. It is textured on the front and has flowing sleeves with a lace design. It is soft and has a thick material. It is great for dressing up and wearing to work but it is also great to dress down and create a more casual look. It is true to size as well. Overall, I would recommend it.

Very cute long sleeve tshirt. The burnt orange color is great and the fit is nice. Very comfy, easy to care for shirt. Fun to accessorize

I really like this shirt. The teal color I bought is so pretty. I washed and air dried it and it still looks really good. Held it's shape, didn't shrink, and was very soft.  Great value for the price!!

Everything else about it just isn't worth buying.
The color, style and fit are superb.

This top is a great versatile piece that you can easily wear as a layer underneath something or by itself. It's very comfy with the light stretch in the fabric, and a good medium weight for a lot of different temperatures. I like the added detail of the stiched down pleats around the neck and shoulders, which elevates the look over a plain long sleeve t-shirt. Overall, good quality, and a great value for the price. I recommend it!

Cute top.  I wore it to work and received so many compliments.  The color was so pretty.  Cotton material.  Not scratchy.  Fits true to size.
Soy gordita y la talla plus ajusta muy bien talla 2xl

First, the color is just perfect and true to the image on order page. The material is stretchy is lightweight but not see through.  I have a long torso, and this covers my belly, but not a tunic length for me.  The blouse can be dressed up or down.  The best part of the blouse is the smocked cuffs. The blouse has an elevated look with this detail. I ordered it another color!

评论概述: nice blouse for office or a casual occasion
评论详情: We've gone "business casual" at the office. These go great with nice jeans, slacks or even a skirt. I've also worn these out on weekends too. Very versatile. True to size.

I love the color and design of this shirt. The gathered wrist area is a little loose at the wrist but is roomy enough to pull up and wear as 3/4 length. The fabric is made of 75% polyester, 20% rayon, and 5% spandex. I ordered the size I normally wear and it fit and it wasn't tight at all.

I am really liking the darting on the top of this blouse. It is subtle but not dowdy, and it draws attention to your bust but not like in a negative way. The color is a punchy fuchsia and I love the flutter sleeves. Wash in cold and hang dry for best preservation of the fit!
Very oversized.  Not flattering

I had to wash it first,  by itself. The try on, made me itchy. However, after washing it then it was fine. Cute. Lots of compliments. I am a bigger set girl and it still looks good. I prefer it with sleeves up most times. When it is cold in office, it's convenient to bring down the sleeves.

This is a very nice top!  I like the blousy sleeves and the pintucks make this stand out in a subtle but notable way.  Very classy!  It fits true to size and is easy to launder.  Excellent for a classy but not overdone look.

I was pleasantly surprised when I opened this blouse and even more pleased when I tried it on. It is fashionable enough to wear with dress slacks and versatile enough to wear with jeans or capris. I ordered it in apricot and it is  a nice beige color with just a hint of peach. I am pleased that I was able to get an XS. That size is rarely available.
Great quality, nice material.  Fits true to size

I ordered this as a gift for my wife. She really likes the styling and light-weight knit fabric. The color is very nice, rich, and true to the picture in the listing on Amazon. It also seems true to size. The top could be equally useful for a business meeting or worn casually with jeans for leisure time. Very nice.

评论概述: Good shirt to dress up or down.
评论详情: This shirt is perfect for dressing up or down.  Fabric feels good on your skin, and the pleats are done well.  Sleeves are easy to push up if you'd like.  It fits true to size according to the size chart on the item description.  I'll probably be ordering this shirt in other colors.

评论概述: Dislike the long smocked wrist elastic
评论详情: I would not have bought this if I had seen it in person. The shirt looks cheap as far as quality of fabric goes. The color is very dull instead of rich. The long elastic smocked section at wrists feels awful and looks odd.

评论概述: Looks and feels good, although not as lightweight as I wanted.
评论详情: I like this shirt. I wasn’t sure how I would feel about the ruffled pinched wrists but they are cute and I can easily pull up my sleeves when doing dishes.  It looks pretty nice, the ribbing on the front is good. The length of the shirt is good. I got a Medium, I’m usually kind of a small or sometimes medium and I like the larger size for this shirt.  My only complaint would be that with the listed fabric type, and the pictures, I had thought this was a more gauzy lightweight fabric. Instead it’s more cotton-like.

This shirt can easily be dressed up or down. I love the fact that the material is soft and breathable. I am not a fan of polyester. The color is soft and the sleeves are long enough for the tall girls. The only thing is that I wish I had ordered a size up to have a looser fit. I love the cost and will definitely be wearing this shirt this fall

The fabric of this shirt is very soft and comfortable. It is a medium weight, which would be ideal for spring or summer. The content is 75% polyester, 20& Rayon and 5% Spandex, which makes it easy care and silky. I like that the neckline sits below the collarbone, not like a t-shirt or plunging. The wrist openings are small enough to keep the sleeves from falling over the hands, but stretchy and not binding.  This shirt will be suitable for various occasions and seasons. The pintuck detailing on the front makes it special. I love the teal green color that I ordered.

I tried it on, washed it, tried it on again. Just doesnt fit my body well. I have wide shoulders, waist, and hip area at 5'9 and 170lbs. I dont think it is a slimming top like the model in the photo. The fabric is super soft and the seams are all tightly stitched. It will fit somebody!

评论概述: Nice casual top, runs a little large
评论详情: Born to be worn with jeans, this medium-weight top--made of soft, stretchy T-shirt fabric--works for cool summer nights and will be perfect for fall. I love the cuffed and styled sleeves, and the pleats in front. I wear a size 8, ordered a large here, and the fit is a little loose, but it's comfy and looks fine. Has held up in the wash like a champ so far: no shrinkage, no color fading. And you can hardly beat the value. Recommend!
This is a very nice blouse. The fabric is soft and drapes well, and the puffs sleeves and ruffled cuffs add interest.

This is a nice shirt for work or casual wear with jeans. The pleats are well-placed and help the shirt flow in a flattering way toward the bottom. The smocked detail on the sleeves is a pretty touch. It's comfortable yet dressy. I love the deep red color.

评论概述: Nice purple color and good details
评论详情: I love purple shirts so getting this was almost a no-brainer for me. It's a light material that will be perfect for those spring and fall days where I like having covered arms but nothing too heavy. The material is thin but not so thin it's at all see-through, at least in this dark color. I also really like the piping on the front running vertically down and the very slight poof to the sleeve. It's subtle, but there.  I don't care for the frill detail on the edge of the sleeves, but I'll get used to it. Having the elastic around the wrist helps ensure the extra frill material doesn't interfere with my hands.  Overall I'm pleased with this shirt and its myriad casual uses.

This is a lovely blouse for work, a night out, church, or any other function. This pairs well with pants.  The pleats sewn at the neckline are quite attractive and draw the eye from other areas. The sleeves drape wonderfully. The smocking at your wrists is not so tight that it irritates. There is a sweet ruffle cuff beyond the smocking for that extra feminine touch.  The blouse does not cover your backside. The red is a deep, rich shade. Use care with it's first laundering as it may bleed dye.

This is a beautiful shirt (which I ordered in blue) that my wife fell in love with. The designs in this shirt are what makes it so great. The pleated ruffles around the top and the decorative sleeves are rather stunning. It fits her perfectly. She looks even more beautiful wearing this shirt. I couldn't be happier with it. At less than $30, this shirt is practically a steal!

The fabric and fit on the picture looks better than in real life. I somehow imagined more silk-like fabric and more flowing style, but it is rather good quality T-shirt cotton-like material and quite casual style.

This is a nicely made top.  The fabric is a stretchy knit.  I ordered my regular size and it fits perfectly - a little loose around the belly, which is as designed and great for my body type.  The wine-red color is true to the listing photo.  I'm sure I'll get a lot of wear out of this comfy top.
